sentence.Network_en: General Pecken roused himself after a moment with an unctuous and benignant smile.
sentence.Network_cn: 过了一会,佩克姆将军装出一副和蔼可亲的神情微微一笑,又活跃起来了.

sentence.Network_en: There is a benignant simplicity about the execution of this work.

sentence.Network_en: Results Of the 23 patients, 14 cases were malignancy, 9 cases were benignant.
sentence.Network_cn: 结果23例小肠梗阻患者中, 恶性病变14例, 良性病变9例.
